import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; const Teams = ({ posts }) => { const [team, setTeam] = useState([]); // Delete by iD const deleteTeam = (id) => { axios .delete(`http://localhost:8080/teams/${id}`) .then((res) => alert(res.data)); setTeam(team.filter((elem) => elem._id !== id)); }; return (
